Sentencas: In H2-supported microgrids, the electrochemical performance deterioration of reversible solid oxide cell (rSOC) is primarily caused by the coarsening of Ni particles.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: Specifically, there are still various unresolved questions from microdegradation mechanisms to macroperformance optimization of rSOC systems that require further investigation and solutions.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: In this study, a novel multiscale-multiphysics field model consisting of a modified Ni coarsening model incorporated into the rSOC system model is used to analyze the effects of operating modes and conditions on degradation behavior.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: The issue of coordination between degradation and efficiency is settled for the first time by introducing minimization of the total operating cost of an rSOC system.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: The results indicate that the degradation rate (rdeg) is higher in the fuel cell mode, and this is related to the partial pressure ratio pH2 /pH2O within H2-electrode pores.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: Furthermore, rdeg is found to be most affected by the PEN temperature, followed by the fuel utilization and fuel molar fraction.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: The minimum total cost is approximately 0.49 $/kWh taken at a low system intake (including H2O, H2, and air) with higher temperatures.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: The optimization weight shifts gradually toward efficiency owing to the higher gas supply cost.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening

Sentencas: These findings provide a valuable reference for the selection of the optimal operating state for the rSOC system considering degradation.
Titulo: Multiscale analysis and cost optimization of a reversible solid oxide cell system with coordinated degradation and efficiency considering Ni-particle coarsening
